NewsArticle.Title: New Friends and Family Package!
NewsArticle.Content: Want a new way to purchase play time for Dark Ages? Check out the Friends and Family Package! For just $49.95, you can purchase six 1 month game codes for Dark Ages (or any other Nexon game). This is the perfect plan for international players who want a simple, convenient way to purchase codes, or for gift-giving to family and friends! Want to find out more? Check out this link here and visit the Coupon Shop page.
